name: Muddled Words
description:
Follow the hints and unscramble the tiles to find the incomplete titles of films, tv shows, sitcoms, animations and musicals.

  • Use arrow keys to move and rearrange the letter tiles.
  • Complete puzzles to unlock more puzzles.
  • If you're stuck, try a different puzzle using the buttons.
  • Clues '?' will help you work out the incomplete title.
  • For each four puzzles solved you'll get a clue (max 9 clues stored, so use them).
  • Hold 'R' to wipe all the save data, game will reload when done.

Comments, spotted bugs, or feedback: @dr_d_king

Versions

v 0.3 - fixed error on Level 31, which was impossible to solve.
